long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temp Email (Outlook) is a handy extension designed to provide you with temporary email addresses, helping to safeguard your personal privacy while using Outlook. This extension allows you to generate one-time email addresses, protecting your primary email from unwanted exposure and reducing spam.
